name: generate_a_random_word
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool random_word_generator.
Tool description: Random words and more provided by RandomWordGenerator.com
API description: Generates a random word by querying the RandomWordGenerator.com database using the specified API keys and generator type.

api_key.description: The API key for authentication with RandomWordGenerator.com. Defaults to '5w36eV0FZJu9QIPlpR18'.

generator.description: The type of word generator to use. Defaults to 'words'.
